overview: Kurt Ketola is the CEO and co-founder of TalkGuyStuff.com. His mission is to provide guys with an informative and entertaining online experience while always promoting the “good” of being a guy! He know that guys work hard, take care of their families and are always up to share helpful information, pictures and interesting stories. TalkGuyStuff.com is the first step and future projects will include an expansion into books, radio and television. His vision is that “Guy Stuff” will compete against sports radio and outdoors oriented TV shows. He is also working on relationships that would allow TGS users to easily connect with retailers when they are ready to shop online.
